name: Glyphs of Eldamir
description:
GoE is an upcoming retro dungeon crawler roguelike.

Try the demo, then pledge on Kickstarter if you enjoyed it!

What's included:

  • 1 'tutorialized' dungeon
  • 4 unique enemies
  • 4 unique weapons
  • 2 spells (known as Glyphs)
  • 1 wearable armor

What's missing:

  • sound (that is what the Kickstarter is for!)
  • a pause/quit menu (you must use Alt+F4 or Cmd+W to close the demo)

Stay informed:

  • Wishlist on Steam! (Coming soon!)
  • Follow development on Twitter and Facebook.
  • Join the mailing list.
